tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

DstIp.description: The private ip of instance bound to the jNAT gateway.

DstPortRange.description: The range of port numbers of the private ip, range: 1-65535. (eg: `port` or `port1-port2`).

Name.description: The name of the Nat Gateway Rule which contains 6-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_' and '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with `tf-nat-gateway-rule-`.

NatGatewayId.description: The ID of the Nat Gateway.

Protocol.description: The protocol of the Nat Gateway Rule. Possible values: `tcp`, `udp`.

SrcEipId.description: The ID of eip associate to the Nat Gateway.

SrcPortRange.description: The range of port numbers of the eip, range: 1-65535. (eg: `port` or `port1-port2`).
